commandobject.name: SetEmotionalEmitter
commandobject.documentation: Sets the emotional emitter for the bot and configures it. The emitter will float at the bots head following the bot.

property.name: Disable
property.documentation: If true disables actual emittor (it will dissappear). No other attributes will be parsed.

property.name: Pause
property.documentation: Should pause the emitter, does not work right now.

property.name: FirstC
property.documentation: Starting color of the floating balls.

property.name: SecondC
property.documentation: Finishing color of the floating balls.

property.name: StartVelocity
property.documentation: This is relative velocity direction vector that will affect the speed and direction of the balls going out. Default (2,2,2).

property.name: EndVelocity
property.documentation: This is relative velocity direction vector that will affect the speed and direction of the balls going in. Default (-10,-10,-10).

property.name: VelocityRange
property.documentation: This will affect the speed of the balls. Default -20.

property.name: Size
property.documentation: This will affect the size of the balls. Default (4,4,8).

property.name: LifeTime
property.documentation: This will affect the life time of the balls and radius and speed they will be traversing. Default 1.6.

property.name: FadeTime
property.documentation: This will affect the fade in and fade out times of the balls. First value affects the starting fade out time. Second value will affect ending fade in time. The third value in the vector is ignored.
